attributes.action: Give the English police a helping hand
attributes.additional_details: Mr.Cameron don't sit on the fence, if you are sincere , either allow the police carry guns in stead of  a spray or make  killing of  a police officer a hanging offence. My son is a serving police officer and I do not want a scum shoot him without him having a chance of defending himself and  the other police officers who are serving to protect the public and properties. Ask yourself who is protecting you  and your family every day with their  lives?
